DOC.detailed_description: To conduct prospective , validation study evaluate data accuracy heart sound recorded LifeVest® Wearable Cardioverter Defibrillator ( WCD ) . To show equivalence , data compare heart sound data record FDA-cleared device . The study enroll minimum 27 maximum 35 subject . Participants adult patient ( age ≥ 18 year ) least seven patient age 40 year . In addition , least five patient history heart failure include . First , participant wear FDA-cleared device 15 minute sit quietly . Then , FDA-cleared device remove participant wear WCD 15 minute sit quietly . Next , wear WCD , participant perform various activity daily live , include least 6 hour overnight wear . Finally , WCD remove participant wear FDA-cleared 15 minute sit quietly . This single center , prospective , observational study . This non-significant risk device study biological study parameter measure noninvasively WCD defibrillation capability disable . In addition , study device use replacement regularly prescribed therapy diagnostics .
